resources.string: Poruka se ne može poslati zbog problema s konekcijom.
Uređena poruka nije mogla biti poslana zbog problema konekcijom.
Poruka nije mogla biti poslana jer se ne može pristupiti %s backend-u.
Uređena poruka nije mogla biti poslana jer se ne može pristupiti %s backend-u.
Pokušajte resetirati sesiju zbog generiranja novih ključeva za enkripciju.
Podijelite odabranu datoteku s drugom aplikacijom
Postavite mjerač za poruke koje se same brišu
Svi uređaji svih sudionika posjeduju valjani MLS certifikat
Kako bi vaš popis razgovora bio uredan, premjestite nekorištene razgovore ovdje. Kasnije ih uvijek možete dearhivirati.
👋 Dobro došli u novu Android aplikaciju Wire!

Stvorite sigurnosnu kopiju kako biste sačuvali povijest razgovora. Ovu opciju možete koristiti za vraćanje povijesti u slučaju da izgubite uređaj ili prijeđete na novi.\n\nOdaberite snažnu lozinku kako bi ste zaštitili datoteku sigurnosne kopije.
Želite razgovarati s obitelji i prijateljima?
Dobrodošli u Wire, najsigurniju platformu za suradnju!
Apsolutno povjerenje da su vaši podaci\u00A0sigurni
Sigurno dijeljenje datoteka s timovima i\u00A0klijentima
Wire je neovisno revidiran i usklađen je s ISO, CCPA, GDPR i SOX standardima
Dobro došli u našu novu Android aplikaciju 👋
Obnovili smo aplikaciju kako bismo je učinili upotrebljivijom za sve.\n\nSaznajte više o redizajnu Wire-a—nove opcije s poboljšanom pristupačnosti, uz jednako jaku sigurnost.
Propuštate nove značajke. Ažurirajte Wire na najnoviju verziju da biste nastavili koristiti aplikaciju s ovim računom.
Vaš Wire serve se treba ažurirati. Obavijestite svog administratora sustava.
Molimo pričekajte dok ne postavimo aplikaciju za vas
Molimo pričekajte dok migriramo podatke za vas
Kako biste premjestili svoje poruke sa stare verzije Wire-a, morate se prijaviti na svoj račun.
Kako biste premjestili svoje poruke sa stare verzije Wire-a, morate se prijaviti na svoj račun %s.
Nažalost, poruke i razgovori nisu mogli biti migrirani zbog nekompatibilnosti sa starijom verzijom Wire-a (error code: %s)
Jeste li sigurni da želite zatvoriti aplikaciju i otkazati migraciju koja je u tijeku?
Ovi detalji računa nisu ispravni. Molimo provjerite svoje podatke i pokušajte ponovo.
Ova adresa e-pošte ili korisničko ime nije važeća. Molimo potvrdite i pokušajte ponovo.
S ovim podacima računa na ovom uređaju, već ste prijavljeni.
Sesija nije valjana ili je istekla! Pokušajte se ponovno prijaviti.
Molimo, unesite ispravan kod za jedinstvenu prijavu.
Unesite važeći kod za jedinstvenu prijavu
Odjavljeni ste jer je Vaš račun izbrisan.
Odjavljeni ste jer je Vaš račun izbrisan.
Aplikacija nije komunicirala s poslužiteljem dulje vrijeme ili je vaša sesija daljinski poništena.
Prema postavkama sigurnosti vašeg tima, vaša povijest razgovora također je izbrisana.
Unesite verifikacijski kod koji smo poslali na %1$s
Nevažeći kôd ili je premašen maksimalan broj pokušaja. Pokušajte ponovno ili zatražite drugi kôd
Uklonite jedan od Vaših ostalih uređaja kako bi ste počeli koristiti Wire na ovom.
Uklonite ovaj uređaj ako ste ga prestali koristiti. Odmah ćete biti automatski odjavljeni.
Uklonite svoj uređaj ako ste ga prestali koristiti. Prema sigurnosnim postavkama vašeg tima, vaša povijest razgovora također će biti izbrisana.
Unesite vašu lozinku da biste koristili Wire na ovom uređaju.

Ako izbrišete poruku za sebe, ona će biti vidljiva samo drugim sudionicima.

Ako je izbrišete za sve, poruka će biti uklonjena za sve sudionike.

Izbrisana poruka se ne može vratiti.
Želite li izbrisati ovu poruku za sebe?
Ako izbrišete poruku za sebe, ona će biti vidljiva samo drugim sudionicima.\n\nIzbrisana poruka se ne može vratiti.
Sigurno razgovarajte s prijateljima i obitelji koristeći Wireov javni poslužitelj.
Unesite svoj email kako biste počeli koristiti najsigurniju platformu za suradnju.
Uspješno ste kreirali svoj timski račun. Počnite komunicirati sigurno – gdje god bili!
Slanje poruka za male organizacije ili konzultantske tvrtke za jednu osobu.\n
Saznajte više o planovima i cijenama
Unesite svoj email kako biste stvorili svoj tim:
Unesite svoj email kako biste stvorili svoj tim:
Uspješno ste kreirali svoj timski račun. Počnite komunicirati sigurno – gdje god bili!
Klikom na nastavak slažete se s našim Uvjetima korištenja i Politikom privatnosti.
Pogledajte Uvjete kotištenja i Pravila privatnosti
Ova e-mail adresa se već koristi.
Vaša je e-pošta identificirana kao nepouzdana, na primjer, zbog odbijanja od strane filtra neželjene pošte.
Ne možete stvoriti ovaj račun jer je vaša e-mail domena blokirana.
Koristite najmanje 8 znakova, s jednim malim slovom, jednim velikim slovom, brojem i posebnim znakom.
Provjerite svoju e-poštu %1$s za verifikacijski kod i unesite ga ispod.
Nevažeći kôd ili je premašen maksimalan broj pokušaja. Molimo pokušajte ponovno ili zatražite drugi kôd
Ovaj tim je dosegao ograničen broja članova.
Ova verzija aplikacije ne dopušta stvaranje osobnih računa.
Ova verzija aplikacije ne dopušta stvaranje timova.
Unesite svoje korisničko ime. Drugima pomaže da vas pronađu u Wireu i povežu se s vama.
Ovo korisničko ime je zauzeto. Molimo odaberite drugo.
Grupnom razgovoru može se pridružiti do 500 ljudi.
Naziv grupe ne smije biti dulji od 64 znaka
Osobe iz backenda %1$s i %2$s ne mogu se pridružiti istom grupnom razgovoru.\n\nDa biste stvorili grupu, uklonite određene sudionike.
Želite li otvoriti datoteku ili je spremiti na svoju mapu za preuzimanje na uređaju?
Ova grupa ima %s sudionika.\nGrupnom razgovoru može se pridružiti do 500 ljudi.
When this is on, all messages in this group will disappear after a certain time.
When this is ON, people from outside your team can join this conversation
Turn this option ON to open this conversation to people outside your team, even if they don\'t have Wire.
Ne možete onemogućiti opciju gosta u ovom razgovoru jer ju je kreirao netko iz drugog tima.
Turn this option ON to open this conversation to services.
Current guests will be removed from the conversation. New guests will not be allowed.
Current services will be removed from the conversation. New services will not be allowed.
You will then no longer be able to send or read messages in this group on any device.
The group will be removed from your conversations list on all devices. You will no longer be able to access the group and its content.
When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
No one reacted on this message yet 😱
No one read this message yet 👀
There was an error trying to change the role. Please check your internet connection and try again
%1$s (@%2$s) will not be able to send or receive messages in this conversation.
There was an error while removing the participant from the group
Izbriši sve osobne informacije i razgovore na ovom uređaju
You will appear as Available to other people. You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
Drugim ljudima ćete izgledati zauzeto. Primat ćete samo obavijesti za spominjanja, odgovore i pozivnice u razgovorima koji nisu isključeni.
You will appear as Away to other people. You will not receive notifications about any incoming calls or messages.
You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
Do not display this information again
Receive notifications for this conversation about everything (including audio and video calls)
Only receive notifications for this conversation when someone calls, mentions you or replies to you
Receive no notifications for this conversation at all
Federated users, externals, guests and services are present
Federated users, externals and guests are present
Federated users, externals and services are present
Federated users, guests and services are present
Federated users and services are present
Federated users and guests are present
Federated users and Externals are present
Externals, guests and services are present
This user is no longer available
%1$s set self-deleting messages to %2$s for everyone
%1$s set self-deleting messages to %2$s for everyone
%1$s turned **off** the timer for self-deleting messages for everyone
%1$s turned **off** the timer for self-deleting messages for everyone
You haven\'t used this device for a while. some messages may not appear here.

The MLS group key was updated without our knowledge. This could happen due to lost messages between backends, or a bug. We have automatically rejoined the conversation, but you may have lost messages.
You didn\'t update your app in time. Some messages may not appear here.
Migration of encryption protocol was canceled.
Migration of encryption protocol has started. Make sure you all your Wire clients are updated.
Migration of encryption protocol is completed. Wire clients which haven\'t been updated will stop receiving messages.
%1$s **participants** could not be added to the group.
%1$s could not be added to the group.
%1$s could not be added to the group.
This conversation is no longer verified, as some user uses at least one device without a valid end-to-end identity certificate.
This conversation is no longer verified, as some user uses at least one device without a valid end-to-end identity certificate.

Communication in Wire is always end-to-end encrypted. Everything you send and receive in this conversation is only accessible to you and other group participants.\n**Please still be careful with who you share sensitive information.**

This conversation moves into your archive. You still get new messages, files, and calls, but no notifications. You can unarchive the conversation at any time.

A call is active in another conversation.\nJoining this call will hang up the other one.

The option to initiate a conference call is only available in the paid version of Wire.

When your connection request is accepted, you can communicate directly with this contact.

Zahtjev za povezivanje nije mogao biti poništen
This user wants to connect with you.
If you accept their request, they will be added as a contact and you two can communicate directly.

Please verify the person\'s identity before accepting the connection request.

Please try again. If this does not help, contact your admin and provide this code:\n%d\"
Sharing and receiving files of any type is now enabled
Sharing and receiving files of any type is now disabled
Open this conversation to people outside your team. You can always change it later.
Open this conversation to services. You can always change it later.

Unable to add service to group
Try again or reach out to your team admin
When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
Guests you selected in the previous step won\'t be part of the group if you do not allow guest access.
%1$s won’t be able to contact you or add you to group conversations. They will not be notified about this.
Wire gives every device a unique fingerprint. Compare them with %1$s and verify your conversation.
Improve receiving notifications by keeping a constant connection to %1$s. It will replace notification services if Google Services are not available on your device.
People see your profile name in conversations, calls, and user search. It is not unique in Wire.
Minimum of 1 and maximum of 64 characters
Ako je opcija isključena, nećete moći vidjeti potvrde o čitanju poruka od drugih ljudi. Ova postavka se ne primjenjuje na grupne razgovore.
If this is ON, then the content of the messages will not be visible on the screenshot or screen recording.
This is enforced by the self-deleting message team setting and cannot be changed.\nThe content of the messages will not be visible on the screenshot or screen recording.
When this is off, you won\'t be able to see when other people are typing, and others won\'t see when you are typing. This setting applies to all conversations on this device.

The app will lock itself after %1$s of inactivity. To unlock the app you need to enter this passcode or use biometric authentication.\n\nMake sure to remember this passcode as there is no way to recover it.
Check your passcode and try again
You will no longer need to unlock Wire with your passcode or biometric authentication.
App lock is now mandatory. Wire will lock itself after a certain time of inactivity. To unlock the app, you need to enter a passcode or use biometric authentication.
App lock is not mandatory any more. Wire will no longer lock itself after a certain time of inactivity.
You can only access the data stored on this device with your app lock passcode. If you have forgotten your passcode, you can remove this device.
If you remove your device, you lose all local data and messages for all accounts on this device permanently.
Enter your password for the account %s to confirm the deletion of all data for all accounts on this device. After removing your device, you can log in with your account credentials.
Confirm the deletion of all data for all accounts on this device. After removing your device, you can log in with your account credentials.
%1$s will be able to contact you or add you to group conversations. You will be able to access a 1:1 conversation with them.

You can only be logged in with %1$d accounts at once. Log out from one to add another.
You can only be logged in with %1$d accounts at once. Log out from one to add another.

The backup will be compressed and encrypted with a password. Make sure to store it in a secure place.
Sigurnosna kopija nije uspješno kreirana. Molimo pokušajte ponovno ili kontaktirajte Wire podršku.
Please verify your input and try again
The backup contents will replace the conversation history on this device. You can only restore history from a backup of the same platform.
Ova sigurnosna kopija je izrađena od novije ili starije verzije Wirea i kao takva nemože se obnovit ovdje.
You cannot restore history from a different account.
Your history could not be restored. Please try again or contact the Wire customer support.
Group content could not be deleted
Conversation content could not be deleted
This backend is configured to use the following proxy server: %1$s
\"This will clear the previous conversation history on all your devices. You remain in the %1$s and have access to all new %1$s activity
You can\'t log in via SSO on an on-premises backend with proxy support.
You can\'t create a personal account on an on-premises backend with proxy support.
You can\'t create a new team on an on-premises backend with proxy support in the app.\nPlease use team management (%1$s) instead on this backend.
You are missing out on new features. Update to the latest version of Wire to continue using the app with this account.
Ako sada odustanete, bit ćete odjavljeni.
Jeste li sigurni da želite odustati?
%1$s was unable to decrypt some of your messages but has solved the issue. This affected all conversations you share together.
You can not share this file because this feature is disabled for this account.
You need to be logged in to Wire before you can share anything
You have been invited to a conversation.\n\n%1$s
The link to this group conversation expired or the conversation was set to private.
The maximum number of participants in this conversation has been reached.
Due to an error you could not be added to the group conversation.
When this is on, all messages in this group will disappear after a certain time. This applies to all group participants.
Invite others with a link to this conversation. Anyone with the link can join the conversation, even if they don’t have Wire.
Something went wrong while downloading this audio file. Please ask the sender to upload it again
Link couldn\'t be created. Please try again
Link couldn\'t be revoked. Please try again
New guests will not be able to join with this link. Current guests will still have access.
Generating guest links is now enabled for all group admins
Generating guest links is now disabled for all group admins
%1$s\nIf you didn\'t do this, remove the device and reset your password.
%1$s\nIf you didn\'t do this, remove the device (navigate to “Manage Devices” in the Settings section of this account), and reset your password.
To verify your own device, compare this key fingerprint with the same key fingerprint on another device.
Verify that this device fingerprint matches the fingerprint shown on %s’s device.
If fingerprints don’t match, reset the session to generate new encryption keys on both sides.
Share this key fingerprint with other participants in a conversation, so that they can verify it and make sure the conversation is secure.
Your email is part of your login details for this account. It may be visible to your contacts.
Please enter a valid email format
The email address you provided has already been registered. Please try again.
A verification email has been sent to your email %1$s.\n\nYour current email address is not changed until you verified your new one. Please check your email inbox and follow the instructions.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Your username helps others to find you in Wire and connect with you. It is unique in Wire.
You can only share a video up to %d MB.
You can only share an image up to %d MB.
You can only share a file up to %d MB.
The file was saved to your device.
Self-deleting messages are enabled. You can set a timer before writing a message.
Self-deleting messages are now mandatory. New messages will self-delete after %1$s.
After one participant has seen your message and the timer has expired on their side, this note disappears.
After %1$s has seen your message and the timer has expired on their side, this note disappears.
Once you are online, this note disappears.
"No application found to open downloads folder"
No Application has been found to do Action
If you continue, we will send a message via email. Follow the link to permanently delete your account.

As of today, your team uses end-to-end identity to make Wire’s usage more secure and practicable. The device verification takes place automatically using a certificate and replaces the previous manual process. This way, you communicate with the highest security standard.\n\nEnter the credentials of your identity provider in the next step to automatically get a verification certificate for this device.

Your team now uses end-to-end identity to make Wire’s usage more secure. The device verification takes place automatically using a certificate.\n\nEnter the credentials of your identity provider in the next step to automatically get a verification certificate for this device.

You can get the certificate in your Wire settings during the next %1$s. Open Devices and select Get Certificate for your current device.\nTo continue using Wire without interruption, retrieve it in time – it doesn’t take long.

The end-to-end identity certificate for this device expires soon. To keep your communication secure, update your certificate now.\n\nEnter your identity provider’s credentials in the next step to update the certificate automatically.
The end-to-end identity certificate for this device has expired.\n\nEnter your identity provider’s credentials in the next step to update the certificate automatically.
The certificate could not be updated.
You can retry to update the certificate now, or you will get a reminder later.
Please try again, or reach out to your team admin.
The certificate is updated and your device is verified.
The audio message will be deleted and can not be sent.
Wire needs permission to use your microphone to record audio messages. Allow access in your device settings.
File size for audio messages is limited to %1$d MB.
You can’t record an audio message during a call.
To make a call, allow Wire to access your microphone in your device settings.
People who want to join the conversation via the guest link need to enter this password first.
You can’t change the password later. Make sure to copy and store it.
Osobe koje se žele pridružiti razgovoru putem veze za goste moraju prvo unijeti ovu lozinku.\nZaboravili ste lozinku? Opozovite vezu i stvorite novu.
Use at least 8 characters, with one lowercase letter, one capital letter, a number, and a special character.
Too many attempts on biometrics. Unlock with passcode instead.
The call was disconnected because at least one participant is no longer a verified contact.
All future messages will be recorded by the device with fingerprint:
This includes deleted, edited and self-deleting messages in all conversations.
Future messages will not be recorded.
All messages, pictures, and documents will be preserved for future access. It includes deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages.
At least one person in this conversation is subject to legal hold.
You are now subject to legal hold.
You are no longer subject to legal hold.
Legal hold is no longer active for this conversation.
Legal hold is now active for this conversation.
At least one participant started using a new device or has an invalid certificate.\n\nDo you still want to send the message?
At least one participant started using a new device or has an invalid certificate.\n\nDo you still want to start the call?
